 but the last NUM lines of each file

so_38299866: declare -i numfile
for f in *; do
  numfile=$([ -f "$f" ] && cat "$f" | wc -l )
  [ $numfile -ge 100 ] && cp "$f" otherdir
done

for f in *; do 
  if [ -f "$f" ]; then
    [ "$(wc -l < $f)" -ge 100 ] && cp "$f" otherdir;
  fi
done
